                            double max,

        Parameters:

      • rule

        public final pid_fuzzy rule​(double[][] me,
                            double[][] mec,
                            double[][] mkp,
                            double[][] mki,
                            double[][] mkd)
        set rule base for fuzzy PID controller
        Parameters:
        me - points to membership function parameter table, terminated by mf
        mec - points to membership function parameter table, terminated by mf
        mkp - points to Kp's rule base table, the rule base must be square
        mki - points to Ki's rule base table, the rule base must be square
        mkd - points to Kd's rule base table, the rule base must be square
        Returns:
        pid_fuzzy

      • kpid

        public final pid_fuzzy kpid​(double kp,
                            double ki,
                            double kd)
        set proportional integral derivative constant for fuzzy PID controller
        Parameters:
        kp - proportional constant
        ki - integral constant
        kd - derivative constant
        Returns:
        pid_fuzzy

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        pid_fuzzy
